column5: Has anyone fished out of this camp on the Chapleau river system in NE Ontario?? Any information on the fishing in mid June or about the camp would be greatly appreciated.
We fished the Chapleau river system once, about ten yrs. ago out of a camp not too far from Kanipahow. If interested in more details email me at: [email protected] Ken
Ken, I sent you an email, from [email protected], hope I didn't end up in your spam buckett!

Spent 7 weeks fishing the area in 1960. It was good then and probably much better now. 47 of those nights were spent in a tent.Your camp has been around for a long time. They must know how to make it work.
Going there in June, will let you know.
